explanation:
code_hardening: Added guards for null/empty text, invalid dimensions, and non-positive text sizes; enforced a fixed decrement step with a safety iteration cap; clamped the target size so it never drops below mMinTextSize.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed all bisection-related variables and constants; eliminated width-based fit logic during resizing; avoided unit-based setTextSize calls and instead sized the existing TextPaint directly to match available project APIs.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced binary search with a decrementing loop that reduces text size in fixed steps until height fits; initialized target size as min(mTextSize, mMaxTextSize); relied solely on height checks in the loop; updated ellipsis handling to use the existing TextPaint directly for StaticLayout and measurement; applied the final size by setting TextPaint text size directly; changed method visibility to package-private.
refactoring: Simplified variable naming, removed intermediate bounds and width checks tied to binary search, and consolidated height measurement within the decrement loop.
misc: Updated inline comments to describe decrement-based resizing behavior and preserved existing line spacing reset, listener callback, and resize-flag handling.
